Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_ZELMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So is it true your store has sold over 10 million
G in product already?!
<PAGE>
That's amazing... It's the biggest news this
town's had in quite a while!

<NAME_MOB_ZELMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear your store has sold over a million G in
product.
<PAGE>
Congrats! Seems all your hard work has finally
paid off.

<NAME_MOB_ZELMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I didn't know your store was that profitable.
You've really got a keen business sense!

<NAME_MOB_ZELMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's so nice to have finally found what I've been
looking for.

<NAME_MOB_ZELMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Did I pay yet? I think I did. Yeah... Yeah, I
definitely paid!

<NAME_MOB_ZELMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Kind of a shame. I came all this way to buy
something nice, but it looks like I'll be going
home with my wallet left untapped today.

<NAME_MOB_ZELMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was debating whether or not to buy
something...but ultimately, I chose not to.

<NAME_MOB_ZELMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll save my money for when I find something I
really want.

<NAME_MOB_ZELMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, dear, I forgot my wallet! How
embarrassing...

<NAME_MOB_ZELMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The stores here have a lot of great products on
offer, don't you think?

<NAME_MOB_ZELMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I may not seem the type, but I actually love
dressing up. When one looks fashionable, one
lives fashionably!

<NAME_MOB_ZELMAR><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmmm... If I should find just the right item to
suit his discerning tastes, perhaps I'll buy
something for my husband today.
